metadata.title: Samsung Galaxy Screen Protector,Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy
description: Kids will Love Looking Like Their Favorite Disney Frozen Characters, Anna and Elsa, with this 12 Piece Lip Gloss and Nail Polish Set. Show Some Sparkle with the 6 Pack of Assorted Flavor Lip Gloss Tubes. Polish the Look Off, with the 6 Pack of Fun Assorted Colored Non-Toxic Nail Polishes. Includes One (1) 6 Piece Lip Gloss Tubes; One (1) 6 Piece Nail Polish. Recommended Ages 3+

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of lip gloss and nail polish, which are makeup items. However, the existing categories do not perfectly match the product. The closest existing category is 'Eye Makeup' under 'Makeup'.
